member.name: M:AdcsToRest.CertificateRequestIntegrityChecks.VerifyCertificateRequest(System.String,System.Int32,System.String@)
member.summary: Verifies if the certificate request can be parsed as defined by the requestType.
member.param: The certificate request in BASE64 format, with or without headers.
The request type specifies how the certificate request is to be interpreted.
Harmonized certificate request, returned as BASE64 without header, regardless of the given input.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.CertificateRequestIntegrityChecks.AutoDetectRequestType(System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Identifies the type of a given certificate request.
member.param: The input certificate request as BASE64 encoded string (aka PEM).
The input certificate request as BASE64 encoded string (aka PEM) without headers.
member.returns: The request type to be used with ICertRequest::Submit

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.Controllers.CertificateAuthorityController.GetCaInfoList
member.summary: Retrieves a collection of all available certificate authorities.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.Controllers.CertificateAuthorityController.GetCaInfo(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves details for a certificate authority.
member.param: The common name of the target certificate authority.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.Controllers.CertificateAuthorityController.GetCaCertificate(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves the current certificate authority certificate for a certificate authority.
member.param: The common name of the target certificate authority.
When set to true, the Certificate response property will be a PKCS#7 container including the certificate chain instead of a plain certificate.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.Controllers.CertificateAuthorityController.GetCaExchangeCertificate(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves the current certificate authority exchange certificate for a certificate authority.
member.param: The common name of the target certificate authority.
When set to true, the Certificate response property will be a PKCS#7 container including the certificate chain instead of a plain certificate.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.Controllers.CertificateAuthorityController.GetCrlDp(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves a collection of certificate revocation list distribution points for a certificate authority.
member.param: The common name of the target certificate authority.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.Controllers.CertificateAuthorityController.GetAia(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves a collection of authority information access distribution points for a certificate authority.
member.param: The common name of the target certificate authority.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.Controllers.CertificateAuthorityController.Get(System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves an issued certificate from a certificate authority.
member.param: The common name of the target certificate authority.
The request ID of the certificate to retrieve.
When set to true, the Certificate response property will be a PKCS#7 container including the certificate chain instead of a plain certificate.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.Controllers.CertificateAuthorityController.PostCertificateRequest(System.String,AdcsToRest.Models.CertificateRequest,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Submits a certificate signing request to a certificate authority.
member.param: The common name of the target certificate authority.
The data structure containing the certificate request and optional settings.
When set to true, the Certificate response property will be a PKCS#7 container including the certificate chain instead of a plain certificate.

member.name: T:AdcsToRest.LocalizedStrings
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.LocalizedStrings.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.LocalizedStrings.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.LocalizedStrings.DESC_INVALID_CSR
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Unable to parse the given certificate request..

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.LocalizedStrings.DESC_MISSING_CA
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The certificate authority {0} was not found..

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.LocalizedStrings.DESC_MISSING_PARAMETER
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The {0} parameter is missing or invalid..

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.LocalizedStrings.DESC_SUBMISSION_FAILED
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Unable to connect to certificate authority because {0}..

member.name: T:AdcsToRest.Models.CertificateAuthority
member.summary: An object holding information about a certificate authority.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.Models.CertificateAuthority.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult)
member.summary: Builds the object from a SearchResult containing a pKIEnrollmentService LDAP object.

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.Models.CertificateAuthority.Name
member.summary: The common name of the certificate authority.

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.Models.CertificateAuthority.CertificateTemplates
member.summary: A list of all certificate templates offered by the certificate authority.

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.Models.CertificateRequest.Request
member.summary: The X.509 certificate signing request as BASE64 encoded DER (aka PEM) string. PKCS#10, PKCS#7/CMS and CMC are supported and are detected automatically.

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.Models.CertificateRequest.RequestAttributes
member.summary: Optional request attributes as a collection of strings. A request attribute is declared as a name-value pair separated by a colon. For example, to specify a certificate template name, you would add "CertificateTemplate:TemplateNameHere".

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.Models.CertificateRevocationListDistributionPoint.Urls
member.summary: A collection of uniform resource locators the certificate revocation list is distributed by the certificate authority.

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.Models.CertificateRevocationListDistributionPoint.Crl
member.summary: The X.509 V2 certificate revocation list. Always returned as BASE64-encoded DER with header (also known as PEM).

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.Models.SubmissionResponse.StatusCode
member.summary: Status code for the processing of incoming API requests and the connection to the certificate authority, Contains HResult error codes as defined in WinErr.h.

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.Models.SubmissionResponse.StatusMessage
member.summary: A textual description of the HResult error code.

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.Models.SubmissionResponse.RequestId
member.summary: The request ID of the issued certificate, or the pending request.

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.Models.SubmissionResponse.DispositionCode
member.summary: The disposition code returned by the certificate authority for the certificate request as defined in CertCli.h. Can be one of: 0 (Request did not complete), 1 (Request failed), 2 (Request denied), 3 (Certificate issued), 4 (Certificate issued separately), 5 (Request taken under submission).

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.Models.SubmissionResponse.DispositionMessage
member.summary: A textual description of the disposition status returned by the certificate authority.

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.Models.SubmissionResponse.Certificate
member.summary: The issued X.509 V3 certificate, if issued by the certificate authority. Always returned as BASE64-encoded DER with header (also known as PEM).
